definition: to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: If the user is not permitted to see any child nodes, an empty collection is returned.
sentences.chinese: 如果使用者不允许检视任何子节点，则会传回空集合。

sentences.english: But some Internet users want more than just someone to chat with.
sentences.chinese: 但是有些互联网络使用者想要的并不只是聊天的对象。

sentences.english: The inside of each house depended on the personality of its owner.
sentences.chinese: 每个房间内怎样的布置，这要看各个使用者的性格了。

sentences.english: With these, and a pair of crutches for back-up, a user can walk around.
sentences.chinese: 有了这些和一对拐杖帮忙，使用者可以走动。

sentences.english: It cannot be dropped and you cannot add or remove users from it.
sentences.chinese: 您无法加以卸除，也无法从其加入或移除使用者。

sentences.english: This user is primarily active on English Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 本使用者主要活跃于英文维基。

sentences.english: In fact, speakers of Russian would say that submarines do swim.
sentences.chinese: 事实上俄语的使用者确实会说“潜艇能游”。

sentences.english: Because the Internet gives users a lot of control over how others view them.
sentences.chinese: 因为互联网络让使用者轻易地掌握别人如何看待他们。

sentences.english: Impersonates the user represented by the specified user token.
sentences.chinese: 模拟由指定使用者语汇基元所表示的使用者。

sentences.english: Impersonates the user represented by the specified user token.
sentences.chinese: 模拟由指定使用者语汇基元所表示的使用者。

sentences.english: That, at least, is the impression you get as a new user.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个新使用者你至少会有这种印象。

sentences.english: Open Access can provide a larger audience with insights into the academic and research domain.
sentences.chinese: 开放近用为学术和研究领域提供较广的使用者。

sentences.english: Gets a value indicating whether the currently logged-on user is in the specified role.
sentences.chinese: 取得值，指出目前登入的使用者是否在指定的角色中。

sentences.english: Does the system "lock-out" a user after a certain number of unsuccessful log-on attempts?
sentences.chinese: 系统是否会在几次密码输入错误的登入后锁定使用者？

sentences.english: Twitter users are very familiar with the iconic image of the Fail Whale.
sentences.chinese: Twitter的使用者非常熟悉这个失能白鲸图像。

sentences.english: Most steroid users consider these effects as an inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 而大部分的类固醇使用者都认为这些影响微不足道。

definition: to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
